hex_points.blurb: A fog-laden village where whispers of lost souls linger.

quests.title: The Bell's Last Toll
quests.summary: Restore the ancient shrine bell to lift the village's curse.
steps: Investigate the shrine's history
Gather materials for restoration
Confront the spirit guarding the bell
quests.success_outcome: The village is freed from despair, bell tolls joyfully.
quests.failure_outcome: The curse deepens, whispers grow louder.

quests.title: Echoes of the Past
quests.summary: Assist a villager in remembering their lost loved ones.
steps: Speak to the grieving villager
Collect mementos of their lost ones
Hold a memorial at the village].
Keep the villagers safe from lurking threats.
quests.success_outcome: The villager finds closure, and peace returns briefly.
quests.failure_outcome: The grief manifests as a haunting spirit.

quests.title: Trauma's Companion
quests.summary: Help a companion confront their past trauma within the lair.
steps: Enter the lair together
Face the creature of their fears
Encourage them to confront their trauma directly.
quests.success_outcome: The companion emerges stronger, with a new perspective.
quests.failure_outcome: The trauma manifests, causing a fracture in the group.

quests.title: The Weaving of Fates
quests.summary: A moral dilemma pits the needs of the many against the few.
steps: Observe the villagers struggling
Choose who to aid in a time of scarce resources
Confront the leader's decision.
quests.success_outcome: Balance is restored, but at a cost; friendships strained.
quests.failure_outcome: Conflicts rise between factions, escalating distrust.

quests.summary: Investigate the rise of shadow bandits plaguing the land.

Track down the bandit hideout
Confront the shadow bandits
quests.success_outcome: Discover the bandit's motives and return home with new allies.
quests.failure_outcome: The bandits escape, and mistrust festers among the villagers.

steps: Collect resources to repair the bridge
Navigate the treacherous swamp

Combat the thralls and find the source of corruption

quests.failure_outcome: The corruption spreads, affecting nearby villages.

quests.title: Broken Bonds

quests.title: A Choice of Shadows
quests.summary: Decide the fate of a captured shadow bandit who begs for mercy.

Consider the consequences of your choice
Choose a path forward

quests.failure_outcome: The choice haunts the party, trust among companions diminishes.
